name: Granpasso
tagline: Full service Partner for Digital Strategies
description:
Game-changing for tomorrow's markets.
As a hybrid of strategic consultancy and a communication agency, we have developed a practically orientated consulting approach that we call 'Smart Consulting’: According to the principle ‘as much theory as necessary, as little as possible’, we develop strategies and solutions with elements from classic strategic consultation practices.
Creative teams with an interdisciplinary set-up develop the consulting results into tangible and visible results.
